external_games.name: Five Nights at F***boy's: Final Mix

name: Five Nights at F***boy's: Final Mix
storyline: You control Freddy, who decided he wants to have a RADICAL NIGHT OF HARDCORE DEBAUCHERY, and the surveillance cameras of the pizzeria are the only thing standing in his way. With the help of Bonnie, Chica, and Foxy, Freddy must destroy the cameras so he can have the time of his life.
summary: Five Nights at F***boy’s is a FNaF fangame created by Sable Lynn and Joshua Shaw in RPG Maker VX Ace featuring unfair difficulty, text-to-speech voice acting, and beautiful, beautiful animatronic...things. The Final Mix edition add's two extra playable side stories, each with their own plots and characters.
